details.description: The Highway Code: warning signs, triangular signs used on roads in Great Britain
details.body:
The Highway Code leaflet ‘Warning signs’ lists all the warning signs used on British roads that alert drivers, riders and cyclists to road conditions, junctions and dangers on the road.

Download ‘Warning signs’ (PDF, 117KB)

details.description: Includes road signs and rules for vehicles and cyclists

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
Contents page for the Highway Code, which applies to England, Scotland and Wales and is essential reading for everyone
